choose.when: FID, FMENU_TYPE, FMENU_CODE, FMENU_NAME, FAPPL_CODE, FFUNC_CODE, FPARENT_CODE, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FORDER, FLVALUE, FRVALUE, FLEVEL, FSUBNUM, FTARGET, FICON, FURL, FDYNAMIC_MENU, FACTION, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK

mapper.select:
select
from ect_menu
order by
${item.field}
desc
mapper.delete: delete from ect_menu where FID in (#{listItem})
mapper.insert: insert into ect_menu (FID, FMENU_TYPE, FMENU_CODE, FMENU_NAME, FAPPL_CODE, FFUNC_CODE, FPARENT_CODE, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FORDER, FLVALUE, FRVALUE, FLEVEL, FSUBNUM, FTARGET, FICON, FURL, FDYNAMIC_MENU, FACTION, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK ) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funcCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{target, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dynamicMenu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update ect_menu
FMENU_TYPE = #{data.menuType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMENU_CODE = #{data.menuCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMENU_NAME = #{data.menuName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAPPL_CODE = #{data.applCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FFUNC_CODE = #{data.funcCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPARENT_CODE = #{data.parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FENABLE = #{data.enable, jdbcType=BIT},
FAUDIT_STATE = #{data.auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FDELETE_STATE = #{data.deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FEDIT_STATE = #{data.editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FORDER = #{data.order, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLVALUE = #{data.lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FRVALUE = #{data.rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLEVEL = #{data.level, jdbcType=INTEGER},

FICON = #{data.icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FURL = #{data.url, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDYNAMIC_MENU = #{data.dynamicMenu, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTION = #{data.action, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FREMARK = #{data.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ect_menu set FMENU_TYPE = #{data.menuType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMENU_CODE = #{data.menuCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMENU_NAME = #{data.menuName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAPPL_CODE = #{data.applCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFUNC_CODE = #{data.funcCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPARENT_CODE = #{data.parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FENABLE = #{data.enable, jdbcType=BIT}, FAUDIT_STATE = #{data.auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FDELETE_STATE = #{data.deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FEDIT_STATE = #{data.editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FORDER = #{data.order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLVALUE = #{data.lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FRVALUE = #{data.rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLEVEL = #{data.level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FSUBNUM = #{data.subnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FTARGET = #{data.target, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FICON = #{data.icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FURL = #{data.url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDYNAMIC_MENU = #{data.dynamicMenu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACTION = #{data.action, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDITOR_ID = #{data.auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDIT_TIME = #{data.auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATOR_ID = #{data.creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATE_TIME = #{data.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FDELETOR_ID = #{data.deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDELETE_TIME = #{data.deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEDITOR_ID = #{data.editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEDIT_TIME = #{data.editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FREMARK = #{data.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ect_menu
FMENU_TYPE = #{menuType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMENU_CODE = #{menuCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMENU_NAME = #{menuName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAPPL_CODE = #{applCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FFUNC_CODE = #{funcCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPARENT_CODE = #{parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FENABLE = #{enable, jdbcType=BIT},
FAUDIT_STATE = #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FDELETE_STATE = #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FEDIT_STATE = #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FORDER = #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLVALUE = #{lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FRVALUE = #{rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FLEVEL = #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FSUBNUM = #{subnum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
FTARGET = #{target, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FICON = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FURL = #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDYNAMIC_MENU = #{dynamicMenu, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FEDITOR_ID = #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FREMARK = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ect_menu set
FMENU_TYPE = #{menuType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMENU_CODE = #{menuCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMENU_NAME = #{menuName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAPPL_CODE = #{applCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFUNC_CODE = #{funcCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPARENT_CODE = #{parentCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FENABLE = #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, FAUDIT_STATE = #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FDELETE_STATE = #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FEDIT_STATE = #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FORDER = #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLVALUE = #{lvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FRVALUE = #{rvalue, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FLEVEL = #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FSUBNUM = #{subnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FTARGET = #{target, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FICON = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FURL = #{url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDYNAMIC_MENU = #{dynamicMenu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACTION = #{action, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDITOR_ID = #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATOR_ID = #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATE_TIME = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FDELETOR_ID = #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEDITOR_ID = #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEDIT_TIME = #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FREMARK = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
